channel.title: Error with .jar file
channel.description: Hey Guys, I've been getting these 2 errors that seem to have no answer on Google so im coming to you. the first is when i try to run the client.jar in a web client i get a error click for details and then it says "java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException" and then i get this 2nd error. http://s13.postimg.org/6tnh3m9qf/New_Bitmap_Image.png Im not sure if its the location of my files when jar'ing or what i would really appreciate your help and time. thanks :)

item.title: Error with .jar file
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[quote=“Killer hat, post:1, topic:509416”]Hey Guys,
I’ve been getting these 2 errors that seem to have no answer on Google so im coming to you.
the first is when i try to run the client.jar in a web client i get a error click for details and then it says “java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException” and then i get this 2nd error.

Im not sure if its the location of my files when jar’ing or what i would really appreciate your help and time. thanks :)[/quote]

Aren’t they the run parameters for the client?

Here’s an example:

java Jframe 30 0 highmem members 32

Read full topic

item.title: Error with .jar file

item.description:
